ygData.subject: RE: Smithing cooking items
ygData.msgSnippet: Well now that dough has been fixed, Pie tins, muffin tins, cookie cutters, skewers, smokers, mixing bowls, jars, cake rounds (for baking) ceramic linings (for
ygData.messageBody:
Well now that dough has been fixed,

Pie tins, muffin tins, cookie cutters, skewers, smokers, mixing bowls, jars,
cake rounds (for baking)

ceramic linings (for smiths)

Graedon
-----Original Message-----
From: Robert DiFranco [mailto:pleezer@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 14, 1999 5:36 PM
To: EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Smithing cooking items


From: Robert DiFranco <pleezer@...>

Heyas,
Out of curiosity. How do you make money as a potter, I mean what is
bought
from u by players and why?

Nagol

Adam Wasserman wrote:

> From: "Adam Wasserman" <wassermana@...>
>
> As a potter the levels are such...
>
> pie tins: doable at 60, triv at 115
> cookie cutters: doable at 70 triv at 135
> muffin tin: doable at 60ish not sure what they triv at.
>
> As a master potter on bristlebane, I can make all of the above or ceramic
> linigs for anyone who is interested. Give me an in game tell.
>
> Graedon
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: David Rogers [mailto:derogers334@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, July 13, 1999 2:51 PM
> To: EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Smithing cooking items
>
> From: David Rogers <derogers334@...>
>
> Does anyone have information on the skill level(s)
> required to achieve a reasonable rate of success with
> the following cooking items?
>
> - Muffin Tin (metal bit + muffing tin mold + ceramic
> lining + water)
>
> - Cookie Cutter (metal bit + cookie cutter mold +
> water)
>
> - Pie Tin (metal bit + pie tin mold + ceramic lining +
> water)
>
> Bakers just got the Dough recipie fixed, and are all
> scrambling to try out the pastery items. This means
> they need the metalware to cook with. Also, does
> anyone have any idea how hard it is for a potter to
> make the ceramic lining required for the muffin and
> pie tins?
>
> Thanks guys.
>
> ===
> :D
> Dave's World
